description.text: Mexico is taste, but also tradition and culture. In 2010, Traditional Mexican Cuisine was added to UNESCO's Cultural and Intangible Heritage of Humanity list. Mexican cuisine is a cornerstone  forcultural identity, social cohesion, and community development.

Mexico has endless ingredients and unique dishes that will make your visit unforgettable. We have an extensive gastronomic offer with over 584,000 restaurants, two of which are ranked within the top 10 in the world, both in Mexico City.

Mexico’s culinary culture is vast, featuring flavors for all tastes, smells, and textures that will awaken your appetite. The best products that the sea, land, and sky may offer—some with a designation of origin—will be served on your plate so that you can enjoy identity, creativity, and, above all, hospitality.
Get to know our carefully planned culinary travels so that you can savor Mexico.
